tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE celebrity_fashion_endorsements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  celebrity_name VARCHAR(255),
  brand_name VARCHAR(255),
  partnership_start_date DATE,
  partnership_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Celebrity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Brand (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    year_founded INT,
    headquarters VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE endorsement ( 
   endorsement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   celebrity_id INT, 
   brand_id INT, 
   partnership_start_date DATE, 
   partnership_end_date DATE, 
   CONSTRAINT fk_celebrity FOREIGN KEY (celebrity_id) REFERENCES celebrity(celebrity_id), 
   CONSTRAINT fk_brand FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES brand(brand_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE endorsements (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    celebrity_id INT REFERENCES celebrities(id),
    brand_id INT REFERENCES brands(id),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE partnerships (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT REFERENCES brands(id),
    partner_company VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE celebrity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    occupation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE brand (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    industry VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE endorsement (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    celebrity_id INT,
    brand_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    payment DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE partnership (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT,
    partner_brand_id INT,
    agreement_date DATE,
    duration INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT,
    celebrity_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2)
);
